message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
